user.title: Configure Ubisys J1
user.description: Select the shade type for {device_name}. This determines which features (position, tilt) are available for control.

manual.title: Select Ubisys Device
manual.description: Choose the Ubisys device you want to configure.

error.zha_not_found: ZHA integration not loaded. Please ensure ZHA is set up and running.
error.no_devices: No unconfigured Ubisys devices found. Please pair your device with ZHA first.

abort.no_devices: No Ubisys devices available. Please pair your device with ZHA first.

init.title: Ubisys {model} Options
init.description: Update configuration for {device_name}. Changing these settings will reload the integration and update device behavior.

input_config.title: Configure Physical Inputs
input_config.description: Select how the physical buttons/switches on {device_name} should behave. This configures the device's InputActions and determines what commands are sent when you press buttons.

error.invalid_preset: Invalid preset selected. Please try again.
error.config_write_failed: Failed to write configuration to device. Ensure the device is powered on and connected to ZigBee network.
error.no_presets: No configuration presets available for this device model.

abort.no_options: No configuration options available for this device type.
abort.no_presets: No input configuration presets available for this device model.

calibrate_j1.name: Calibrate J1
calibrate_j1.description: Run the automated calibration sequence for a Ubisys J1 window covering controller. This moves the cover through its full range to measure total steps and configure the device for the selected shade type.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The Ubisys J1 cover entity to calibrate.
